title: Multimedia Stravinsky: the rite of spring (PC)
brief_description: This is an insightful multimedia exploration of Stravinsky’s passionate composition. Explore the ballet, the music and the cultural milieu that gave birth to Stravinky’s art. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC with 386SX or higher miscroprocessor, 2MB of RAM, 30-MB hard disk, CD-ROM drive, audio board, VGA display, Microsoft Windows operating system (3.1 or later), MS-DOS operating system version 3.1 or later.
